creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
dimension:
8 3/4 × 6 1/4 in. (22.23 × 15.88 cm) (image, landscape)
8 11/16 × 6 1/4 in. (22.07 × 15.88 cm) (image, calligraphy)
57 3/4 × 13 13/16 in. (146.69 × 35.08 cm) (mount, without roller)
inscription: Watching the clouds, we gather herbs / loving their hidden fragrance; / Drinking sake, we play the qin / and chant in the evening cool. / Those who have come to dwell in the riverside huts / have limitless pleasure; / Part of the joy of getting drunk / is that it makes us feel at home. (SA)
markings: center R edge of landscape; URC, LLC of calligraphy
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on paper
signed: center R edge of landscape; LLC of calligraphy
text: Painting is by Shukin, calligraphy by Shunkin.
title: Pouring Wine at Dusk at the Riverside Dwellings
